phrase.value: Always ask for my user name and password
Auto login until I logout explicitly
Do you want to delete this record?
Do you want to delete the selected records?
Please enter the validation code shown
Exceed maximum sender email count or email address incorrect
Exceed maximum recipient email count or email address incorrect
Exceed maximum cc email count or email address incorrect
Exceed maximum bcc email count or email address incorrect
Exceed maximum login retry count. Account is locked. Please try again in %t minutes
Exceed maximum export email count. Please try again later
You do not have permission to access the page.
You do not have permission to add the record.
You do not have permission to delete the record.
You do not have permission to edit the record.
The reset password email has been sent to you
Data has been changed by other user. Click [Reload] to retrieve the changed data (your data in the form will be overwritten) or click [Overwrite] to overwrite the changed data.
Registration succeeded. An email has been sent to your email address, please click the link in the email to activate your account.
You cannot add or update a record because the foreign key value does not exist in the master table '%t'
You cannot delete a record because related records exist in the detail table '%t'
The current user (%c) is not authorized to assign the user ID (%u).
The current user (%c) is not authorized to assign the parent user ID (%p).
The current user (%c) is not authorized to insert the record. Master filter: %f
The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini
The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE directive that was specified in the HTML form
The uploaded file was only partially uploaded
Failed to write file to disk
A PHP extension stopped the file upload
The uploaded file exceeds the post_max_size directive in php.ini
Total length of file names exceeds field length
User level name for user level -1 must be 'Administrator'
User Level ID must be integer
User level name for user level 0 must be 'Default'
User defined User Level ID must be larger than 0
User defined User Level name cannot be 'Administrator' or 'Default'
User profile is corrupted. Please logout and login again
